message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its quality and features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exquisite item to you for $150. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. However, $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Let me know what you think.
